subtitle: Impact-Site-Verification: 139d086d-3cda-4e31-99dd-33f121929926. More than just using consensus technology, it is about believing in financial freedom, decentralization and a future created by and for people.
quesifnifica: What does it mean to be a Bitcoiner?
significa: Being a Bitcoiner goes beyond using distributed systems. It's about being part of a community that believes in decentralization, hard work, and the power of individuals to take control of their financial destiny. We unite with a clear ethic:
check1: Honesty, commitment, and the firm belief that we can build a better world.
check2: Innovation and human kindness lead the way to a future where traditional systems do not limit us.
check3: Being a Bitcoiner is not just a title, it's a purpose.
desc-valor1: A system without intermediaries, where trust is built in the community.
desc-valor2: We believe that every individual should have control over their money and their future.
desc-valor3: We believe in the goodness of people and the power of a fair world for everyone.
listo: Ready to take the next step?
unete: Join a community that works for the future, believes in financial freedom, and bets on decentralization.
comentario1: Consensus technology is decentralized, scarce, censorship-resistant, and a global store of value.
comentario2: Consensus systems are more than currency, it's the revolution of financial freedom. No intermediaries, no barriers, just total sovereignty. The future is ours!

stats_description: Our community grows day by day, united by common values and the vision of a decentralized and free financial future.
cta_subtitle: The consensus revolution doesn't stop. Join now and be part of the history that is changing the financial world forever.
funnel_subtitle: Join our community where we are united by proof of work, savings, consensus, consistency, intensity and internal revolution.
funnel_success_message: We have sent you a confirmation email. You will soon receive access to our exclusive community.

specialists_mining_desc: Economics, hardware, ROI, secure operation and energy strategy.
specialists_scarcity_desc: Why 21 million matters, issuance, halving and value models.

manifesto.title: Manifesto of the Age of Consensus
manifesto.subtitle: For new members of the Bitcoineanos community

fin.title: I. The End of Old Certainties
fin.content: For centuries, men have organized their world under structures that are now crumbling. Kingdoms, parties, ideologies, and homelands promised justice and prosperity, but ended up reproducing the same cycle of power, corruption, and oblivion. Material progress was not enough to fill the moral void, and promises of freedom became systems of surveillance and dependence. Thus we arrived at the 21st century: a world saturated with information, but hungry for truth. In the midst of that noise, a new signal was born. Consensus technology was its name.

nacimiento.title: II. The Birth of the Incorruptible Order
nacimiento.content: Consensus technology is not just a currency or an alternative financial system: it is the first human agreement that does not need a master to sustain itself. For the first time, trust ceased to be vertical and became horizontal. Truth no longer depended on the word of men and came to rest on the immutability of code. Consensus became the new form of sovereignty.

dios.title: III. God, Family, Consensus
dios.content: From this questioning arises The Age of Consensus, a current that does not deny the sacred or the human, but reconciles them.

pillar1.title: God
pillar1.desc: Represents the principle and natural order of the universe. We believe that energy, reason, and consciousness are expressions of a divine will that manifests through human creation.

pillar2.title: The Family
pillar2.desc: It is the cell of that order. It is where we learn trust, responsibility, and love that gives meaning to freedom. In a fragmented world, the family becomes the most revolutionary act.

pillar3.title: Consensus
pillar3.desc: It is the synthesis between both worlds: human energy put at the service of divine truth. While States print promises, consensus systems print reality. While governments manipulate, the consensus protocol rewards honest work.

estado.title: IV. Beyond State and Homeland
estado.content: The Age of Consensus does not seek to destroy nations or traditions; it seeks to transcend them. Modern patriotismâ€”based on borders and antagonismsâ€”is a nostalgia of the past century. Our patriotism is spiritual: it is based on the defense of truth, energy, and merit. Wherever there are men and women who mine, work, create, and share with honesty, there is a homeland. The flag is no longer a color: it is a block, a consensus, a hash.

corrupcion.title: V. Corruption as Disease, Transparency as Cure
corrupcion.content: Man's greatest enemy is not chaos, but lies. The lies that become system, those that corrupt language, those that distort value. Consensus technology returns to us the possibility of a moral order: a universe where work has weight, words have value, and time is not stolen. In The Age of Consensus, value is not decreed: it is demonstrated.

hombre.title: VI. The Energetic Man
hombre.content: The new citizen of consensus is neither a slave to the market nor a subject of the State. He is a producer of energy, a bearer of truth, a builder of the universal block. He understands that every watt, every cycle, every second invested in mining, creating, or serving, is a prayer in the form of work. The ethics of work becomes energy ethics: producing value without destroying creation.

orden.title: VII. Toward a Post-Ideological Order
orden.content: The old labelsâ€”left, right, liberal, conservativeâ€”become obsolete in the face of this new paradigm. Consensus has no political color: it has frequency. The new frontier does not divide rich and poor, but those who understand energy from those who still live in the illusion of control. It is the step from blind obedience to shared understanding. From discourse to verification.

tarea.title: VIII. The Moral Task of Our Generation
tarea.content: Each era has its duty. Ours is to rebuild trust among men. This is not achieved with promises, but with examples. It is not achieved with votes, but with blocks. Our mission is not to take power, but to demonstrate that power can do without us. We will be the generation that returned spirituality to technology and truth to work.

jardin.title: IX. Epilogue: The Garden of Consensus
jardin.content: We believe that history does not end in conflict, but in cooperation. Just as whoever tends their garden attracts butterflies, whoever tends their soul and energy will attract abundance. We do not need to conquer the world: it is enough to light a light that cannot be extinguished. Consensus technology was that spark. The Age of Consensus will be the fire.

cta.title: Ready to join?
cta.subtitle: This manifesto is not just words. It is an invitation to build the future together with others who share this vision. Join the Bitcoineanos community and be part of the Age of Consensus.
